subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Sultanate ruled over Rajasthan for the longest duration?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मूल नए नेत्रवास के बार्त्ता के क्या राजधानी थे?
explanation_en: The Tughlaq Dynasty ruled over Rajasthan for the longest duration among the given options.
